Author: Farullalla Fashuk#6832
Content: Hi all, I moved my KMD from Agama to my Ledger Nano S after the hack (right in time, I think).  But when I try to access that account I get a synchronisation error (API HTTP 503). Is this a ledger issue or might there be a connection to the hack? Thanks for your help!

Author: Farullalla Fashuk#6832
Content: (In the KMD explorer I can see the tx being successful, funds are still on the address provided by the ledger nano)

Author: Alright#0419
Content: @Farullalla Fashuk it's a problem with ledger's backend servers, no relation to the hack
